{"step_by_step_thinking": "The physiological active form of cholesterol is the form that is involved in various physiological processes. According to Document [2], the active form of cholesterol is the fraction that exceeds the complexing capacity of the polar bilayer lipids. This active cholesterol prompts several feedback responses and is involved in various physiological processes. Therefore, the active form of cholesterol is not a lipoprotein or a lipid, but free cholesterol.", "answer_choice": "C. Free cholesterol"}
